message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great fit for your needs. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1300000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1150000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit above your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my own budget. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1225000.

I'm getting close to your price, but I still need to make sure I'm getting the best deal. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still a bit above your budget. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1210000.
